name: Apricot Walnut Loaf
author: ruth
summary: This is a great bread for coffee break. The dough can be made in the bread machine or by hand.
directions: Place all ingredients except preserves, walnuts, and apricots into bread machine in the proper order for your machine
As the bread kneads, adjust the liquid to flour ratio if needed
At the end of the dough cycle, remove dough and place on floured board
Cover and let rest for 10 minutes
Roll out into a rectangle, brush with apricot preserves, and sprinkle walnuts and apricots on top
Roll up into a loaf, place in greased bread pan, cover, and let rise for 45 minutes
At the end of the rising time, slash down the center, brush with a little beaten egg or egg substitute and milk, and bake in a preheated 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) oven for 25-30 minutes
Remove bread from pan, place on rack, and let cool
